rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] – {1}{U}{B} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Storms Eye[/i] – Whenever Hector, Emblem of the Brash General, engages or an opponent attacks a player with two or more creatures, surveil 3. Reveal the top card of your library. If the revealed card is a land card, prevent all damage target creature would deal this turn. Otherwise, Hector deals 3 damage to each opponent.
